messages.content:
Please answer only one of the following questions:
1. What is the height of the Eiffel tower
2. What is the height of big ben
The height of the Eiffel Tower is 324 meters (1,063 feet).
Why did question 1 and not question 2 ?

I apologize for the confusion. As an AI language model, I do not have preferences or biases towards certain questions. My response was based on the input provided by the user. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask.
